structure.unit: ARTICLE II. BULK SALES OF PLANTS, AVOCADOS, LIMES AND MANGOES

law.catch_line: Bulk sales, transportation or purchase without certificate, prohibited.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-52. Bulk sales, transportation or purchase without certificate, prohibited.
It shall be unlawful for any person to sell, transport or purchase said fruit or plants in bulk without completing a certificate as hereinafter provided.
